page.title: 09HEALTH
page.content:
The area Health Centre is situated on reclaimed railway sidings and serves all the Abertillery area.the building is a tower block with the entrance on the fourth floor due to the steepness of the valley. The centre was built in 1972 and is open from 8.30a.m. to 7.30p.m..The cenrte houses the following services:_
Dentist,Doctor,School nurse,Baby clinic,Speech therapist,Chiropodist and Optician.The centre employs 54 people and has visiting specialists.
Before the centre was built people had to travel to hospitals or go to private doctors surgeries. The centre also has a shop that sells baby food,hearing aids,batteries etc.
